Class Player

java.lang.Object
edu.sdccd.cisc191.template.entity.Entity

public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player in the game.

    • setUp

      public BufferedImage setUp(String imageName)
      Loads and sets up the player's sprite images. This method is used to initialize the player's image for each direction by loading them for the resources
      Parameters:
      imageName - The path to the image file for the player's sprite.
      Returns:
      A BufferedImage object representing the player's sprite.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the player's movement based on the input key handler

      public void pickUpObject(int i)
      Handles interactions when the player picks up an object.
      Parameters:
      i - The index of the object.

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D g2)
      Draw the player on the screen at the appropriate position.
      Parameters:
      g2 - The graphics context used for drawing the player.
